    • Method Detail

      • mutable

        public final MutableDoubleMatrix.Abs.Sparse<U> mutable()
        Create a mutable version of this DoubleMatrix.
        The mutable version is created with a shallow copy of the data and the internal copyOnWrite flag set. The first operation in the mutable version that modifies the data shall trigger a deep copy of the data.
        Specified by:
        mutable in class DoubleMatrix<U extends Unit<U>>
        Returns:
        MutableDoubleMatrix<U>; mutable version of this DoubleMatrix

      • createMatrix2D

        protected final cern.colt.matrix.tdouble.DoubleMatrix2D createMatrix2D(int rows,
                                                     int columns)
        Create storage for the data.
        This method must be implemented by each leaf class.
        Specified by:
        createMatrix2D in class DoubleMatrix<U extends Unit<U>>
        Parameters:
        rows - int; the number of rows in the matrix
        columns - int; the number of columns in the matrix
        Returns:
        DoubleMatrix2D; an instance of the right type of DoubleMatrix2D (absolute/relative, dense/sparse, etc.)
